title: Password stopped working..?
body: So I was playing league earlier today all fine and dandy and went and did things and came back several hours later unable to log in. After several attempts typing my password slowly, double checking CAPS, Hotkeys etc that nothing was affecting my keyboard or characters it has been deemed my password does not work anymore. I was wondering if a Riot employee can help me out because after going through the forgot a password link the email bot stopped working. Any help would be helpful. This is not my main account, my main is "Mezeip".

replies.body:
We can assist you in recovering your account if you submit a ticket with [**this form**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new?ticket_form_id=72416) and provide *as much information* about your account that you can recall.

Let me know if you have any questions.
